items.sentence: Tom was arrested and immediately taken to headquarters.
Tom was lonely and he wished he had someone to talk to.
Tom was lucky to grow up in a multilingual environment.
Tom was unable to get Mary to understand what he meant.
I couldn\'t swim as well as the other kids in my class.
I couldn\'t understand a single word of what they said.
I didn\'t eat all the fries because they were too oily.
As soon as the child saw his mother, he stopped crying.
Can you remember the first word you learned in English?
Before Tom did it, I\'d have said it couldn\'t be done.
